meanings.sent1: The understudied topic was not well understood by the students.
meanings.sent2: The scientist decided to study the understudied species of plants.
meanings.sent3: The understudied mystery of the missing socks was finally solved.
meanings.sent4: Her understudied talent for painting was a hidden gem waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The understudied disease spread quickly due to lack of knowledge about it.

meanings.definition: Not given enough attention or focus.
meanings.sent1: The understudied project failed to meet the deadline.
meanings.sent2: The understudied student struggled to keep up with the class.
meanings.sent3: The understudied cat demanded more affection from its owner.
meanings.sent4: Her understudied emotions finally erupted after being ignored for too long.
meanings.sent5: The understudied issue became a major problem when left unattended.
